nodes.text: Toydaria Swirl was a beverage sold at the Milk Stand in Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu. It was suitable for consumption by humans. The drink was based on the original frozen green milk drink available at the stand, with a swirl of savory seasoning and fruit jelly.

The Toydaria Swirl was available at the Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge Milk Stand in Disneyland only. Although unavailable on opening day, the drink was added to the Milk Stand's menu on January 17th, 2020. The menu's description of the drink reads, "Plant-based Green Milk swirled with savory Lime Seasoning and Mango Jelly."
